variables.input:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
     AND event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
     AND event.type == "VULNERABILITY_FINDING"
     AND object.type == "CONTAINER_IMAGE"
     AND isNotNull(component.name)
| summarize rawValues = arrayRemoveNulls(arraySort(collectDistinct(event.provider)))
| fieldsAdd values = if(arraySize(rawValues) > 0, rawValues, else:"None")

fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
     AND event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
     AND event.type == "VULNERABILITY_FINDING"
     AND object.type == "CONTAINER_IMAGE"
     AND isNotNull(component.name)
| summarize rawValues = arrayRemoveNulls(arraySort(collectDistinct(container_image.registry)))
| fieldsAdd values = if(arraySize(rawValues) > 0, rawValues, else:"None")

fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
     AND event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
     AND event.type == "VULNERABILITY_FINDING"
     AND object.type == "CONTAINER_IMAGE"
     AND isNotNull(component.name)
| summarize rawValues = arrayRemoveNulls(arraySort(collectDistinct(container_image.repository)))
| fieldsAdd values = if(arraySize(rawValues) > 0, rawValues, else:"None")

fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
     AND event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
     AND event.type == "VULNERABILITY_FINDING"
     AND object.type == "CONTAINER_IMAGE"
     AND isNotNull(component.name)
| summarize rawValues = arrayRemoveNulls(arraySort(collectDistinct(container_image.tags, expand:true)))
| fieldsAdd values = if(arraySize(rawValues) > 0, rawValues, else:"None")

fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
     AND event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
     AND event.type == "VULNERABILITY_FINDING"
     AND object.type == "CONTAINER_IMAGE"
     AND isNotNull(component.name)
| summarize rawValues = arrayRemoveNulls(arraySort(collectDistinct(vulnerability.id)))
| fieldsAdd values = if(arraySize(rawValues) > 0, rawValues, else:"None")

fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
     AND event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
     AND event.type == "VULNERABILITY_FINDING"
     AND object.type == "CONTAINER_IMAGE"
     AND isNotNull(component.name)
| summarize rawValues = arrayRemoveNulls(arraySort(collectDistinct(component.name)))
| fieldsAdd values = if(arraySize(rawValues) > 0, rawValues, else:"None")

fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
     AND event.kind == "SECURITY_EVENT"
     AND event.type == "VULNERABILITY_FINDING"
     AND object.type == "CONTAINER_IMAGE"
     AND isNotNull(component.name)
// now enrich the runtime context
| join [
    fetch dt.entity.container_group_instance, from:now()-3h
    | fieldsAdd entity.name, containerImageDigest, containerImageName, workloadName, containerStatus, processes=contains[dt.entity.process_group_instance]
    | expand dt.entity.process=processes
        | fieldsRemove processes
        | join [
            fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance, from:now()-3h
        ], on:{left[dt.entity.process]==right[id]}, kind:leftOuter, fields:{releasesProduct, releasesStage}
], on:{left[container_image.digest]==right[containerImageDigest]}, kind:leftOuter,
   fields:{container_instance.id=id, container_instance.name=entity.name, container_image.name=containerImageName,
           releasesProduct, releasesStage, containerStatus}
| filter isNotNull(container_instance.id) AND contains(containerStatus, "running")
| fieldsAdd releasesStage = if(isNull(releasesStage), "None", else:releasesStage)
| summarize rawValues = arrayRemoveNulls(arraySort(collectDistinct(releasesStage)))
| fieldsAdd values = if(arraySize(rawValues) > 0, rawValues, else: "None")

1.content:
# Container image alert reduction
Demonstration of the funnel for alert reduction from container vulnerability findings using runtime context. Learn more about [Security events ingest](https://dt-url.net/1d63p0v).

5.title: Critical risk
5.query:
fetch events
// data access
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
     AND event.type == "VULNERABILITY_FINDING"
     AND object.type == "CONTAINER_IMAGE"
     AND isNotNull(component.name)
| dedup {object.id, vulnerability.id, component.name, component.version,
         container_image.registry, container_image.repository}, sort: {timestamp desc}
// dashboard variables
| filter in(event.provider, $Product)
     AND in(container_image.registry, $Registry)
     AND in(container_image.repository, $Repository)
     AND iAny(in(container_image.tags[], $Tag))
     AND in(dt.security.risk.level, $RiskLevel)
     AND in(vulnerability.id, $Vulnerability)
     AND in(component.name, $Component)
// aggregation and custom filtering
| filter dt.security.risk.level=="CRITICAL"
| summarize {Vulnerabilities=countDistinctExact(vulnerability.id)}

6.title: High risk
6.query:
fetch events
// data access
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
     AND event.type == "VULNERABILITY_FINDING"
     AND object.type == "CONTAINER_IMAGE"
     AND isNotNull(component.name)
| dedup {object.id, vulnerability.id, component.name, component.version,
         container_image.registry, container_image.repository}, sort: {timestamp desc}
// dashboard variables
| filter in(event.provider, $Product)
     AND in(container_image.registry, $Registry)
     AND in(container_image.repository, $Repository)
     AND iAny(in(container_image.tags[], $Tag))
     AND in(dt.security.risk.level, $RiskLevel)
     AND in(vulnerability.id, $Vulnerability)
     AND in(component.name, $Component)
// aggregation and custom filtering
| filter dt.security.risk.level=="HIGH"
| summarize {Vulnerabilities=countDistinctExact(vulnerability.id)}

10.title: Number of vulnerabilities by risk
10.query:
fetch events
// data access
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
     AND event.type == "VULNERABILITY_FINDING"
     AND object.type == "CONTAINER_IMAGE"
     AND isNotNull(component.name)
| dedup {object.id, vulnerability.id, component.name, component.version,
         container_image.registry, container_image.repository}, sort: {timestamp desc}
// dashboard variables
| filter in(event.provider, $Product)
     AND in(container_image.registry, $Registry)
     AND in(container_image.repository, $Repository)
     AND iAny(in(container_image.tags[], $Tag))
     AND in(dt.security.risk.level, $RiskLevel)
     AND in(vulnerability.id, $Vulnerability)
     AND in(component.name, $Component)
// aggregation and custom filtering
| summarize {
    numberOfVulnerabilities = countDistinctExact(vulnerability.id),
    riskScore=takeMax(dt.security.risk.score)}, by:{dt.security.risk.level}
| sort riskScore desc

20.title: Medium risk
20.query:
fetch events
// data access
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
     AND event.type == "VULNERABILITY_FINDING"
     AND object.type == "CONTAINER_IMAGE"
     AND isNotNull(component.name)
| dedup {object.id, vulnerability.id, component.name, component.version,
         container_image.registry, container_image.repository}, sort: {timestamp desc}
// dashboard variables
| filter in(event.provider, $Product)
     AND in(container_image.registry, $Registry)
     AND in(container_image.repository, $Repository)
     AND iAny(in(container_image.tags[], $Tag))
     AND in(dt.security.risk.level, $RiskLevel)
     AND in(vulnerability.id, $Vulnerability)
     AND in(component.name, $Component)
// aggregation and custom filtering
| filter dt.security.risk.level=="MEDIUM"
| summarize {Vulnerabilities=countDistinctExact(vulnerability.id)}

21.title: Percentage of vulnerabilities by funnel stage
21.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
     AND event.type == "VULNERABILITY_FINDING"
     AND object.type == "CONTAINER_IMAGE"
     AND isNotNull(component.name)
| filter in(event.provider, $Product)
     AND in(container_image.registry, $Registry)
     AND in(container_image.repository, $Repository)
     AND iAny(in(container_image.tags[], $Tag))
     AND in(dt.security.risk.level, $RiskLevel)
     AND in(vulnerability.id, $Vulnerability)
     AND in(component.name, $Component)
// now enrich the runtime context
| join [
    fetch dt.entity.container_group_instance, from:now()-3h
    | fieldsAdd entity.name, containerImageDigest, containerImageName, workloadName, containerStatus, processes=contains[dt.entity.process_group_instance]
    | expand dt.entity.process=processes
        | fieldsRemove processes
        | join [
            fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance, from:now()-3h
        ], on:{left[dt.entity.process]==right[id]}, kind:leftOuter, fields:{releasesProduct, releasesStage}
], on:{left[container_image.digest]==right[containerImageDigest]}, kind:leftOuter,
   fields:{container_instance.id=id, container_instance.name=entity.name, container_image.name=containerImageName,
           releasesProduct, releasesStage, containerStatus}
// summarize and filter
| fieldsAdd releasesStage=if(isNull(releasesStage), "None", else:releasesStage)
| fieldsAdd types=if(isNotNull(container_instance.id) AND in(releasesStage,$ProductStage),
                     array("All","Running","Running (prod)"),
              else:if(isNotNull(container_instance.id) AND contains(containerStatus, "running"), 
                     array("All","Running"),
              else:array("All")))
| expand type=types
| summarize Vulnerabilities=countDistinctExact(vulnerability.id), by:{`Funnel stage`=type}

49.title: Container images in registries
49.query:
fetch events
// data access
| filter dt.system.bucket == "default_security_custom_events"
     AND event.type == "VULNERABILITY_FINDING"
     AND object.type == "CONTAINER_IMAGE"
     AND isNotNull(component.name)
| dedup {object.id, vulnerability.id, component.name, component.version,
         container_image.registry, container_image.repository}, sort: {timestamp desc}
// dashboard variables
| filter in(event.provider, $Product)
     AND in(container_image.registry, $Registry)
     AND in(container_image.repository, $Repository)
     AND iAny(in(container_image.tags[], $Tag))
     AND in(dt.security.risk.level, $RiskLevel)
     AND in(vulnerability.id, $Vulnerability)
     AND in(component.name, $Component)
// aggregation and custom filtering
| summarize {images=countDistinctExact(container_image.digest)}
